backend/main.mo: Defines data models and core actor logic for clinics, patient submissions, professionals, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence descriptions of many frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode color systems and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and toast system, including protected medical‑team routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with conditional visibility and patient‑page‑specific labeling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter their name on first login and saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Guards medical‑team pages, showing a restricted‑access screen when unauthenticated and loading the profile dialog when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Provides search and date filtering inputs for the dashboard submissions list.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Export: Exports patient submissions to a CSV file using extracted fields from submission context.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Submis: Displays a list of patient submissions with extracted summary fields and supports selection.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormSectio: A styled card wrapper component for form sections.
frontend/src/components/forms/RequiredMa: Renders a red asterisk indicating a required field.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the app footer with branding, current year, and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the header with navigation, logo, and role-based view switching.
Provides the global layout shell including header, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and handles query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useClinicTeam.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update clinic team members through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a minimal wrapper to access the actor and its loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmissions.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, submitting, and updating patient submissions through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the theme and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays all patient submissions with search, date filtering, export, and navigation to team view.
frontend/src/pages/ExamSuccessPage.tsx: Shows a completion screen after an exam and encourages leaving a Google Maps review, with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PatientFormPage.tsx: Provides a registration form for patient info and submits a new in-progress patient submission before redirecting to success.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Shows a simple confirmation screen after patient form submission with an option to submit another response.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Allows team members to view and update a patient submission, extracting and editing medical fields from context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project state, design goals, and required features for rebuilding a medical registration app using React, Firebase, and Internet Identity. Lists architectural notes, existing features, and access control requirements.
